Class diceRolls

  • java.lang.Object
    • miniGame
      • diceRolls

  • public class diceRolls
extends miniGame
    Date: May 14th 2018 This class creates the minigame Dice Rolls. Parent Class is miniGame. The user rolls a number between 1 and 10, and if the Villain rolls higher number, user looses the game and vice versa. Odds of winning the game can be improved by buying Weighted Dice Item in the Shop.
    Author:
    Sachin Sakthivel and Sasiru Goonatillake

        public boolean play​(Hero hero)
        Description copied from class: miniGame
        Parent method for minigames which allows the User to use a Hero to fight the villain using the specified minigame.

      • gameDescription

        public java.lang.String gameDescription​()
        Description copied from class: miniGame
        Parent method for minigames which allows a description of a minigame to be obtained for a specific minigame. The description will be specified in each minigame.
        Overrides:
        gameDescription in class miniGame
        Returns:
        Returns String "Not Implemented Yet" by default.

      • results

        public java.lang.String results​()
        This method returns a String variable dependent on the boolean variable 'gameWon'. If gameWon is true, String variable output will be set to an appropriate response and vice versa.
        Returns:
        Returns String output which contains flavour text intended to be shown in JTextAreas in the GUI element of the Game.
